Function# IOSleepWithLeeway

macOS 10.11+

```
void IOSleepWithLeeway(unsigned int intervalMilliseconds, unsigned int leewayMilliseconds);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/1575303-iosleepwithleeway#see-also)

### [Sleep](/documentation/kernel/1575303-iosleepwithleeway#sleep)

[`IODelay`](/documentation/kernel/1575328-iodelay)Spin delay for a number of microseconds.[`IOPause`](/documentation/kernel/1575333-iopause)Spin delay for a number of nanoseconds.[`IOSleep`](/documentation/kernel/1575320-iosleep)Sleep the calling thread for a number of milliseconds.
